alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 04 at 1:18PM MST until December 05 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...Through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills
